goals__remit: Corinth Pipeworks S.A. is a global supplier of high quality steel pipes for the energy and construction market. Maintaining its dedication to delivering energy to the world it will continue to grow sustainably, set standards of excellence, refine its quality, invest and further develop its technical knowledge while expanding its capabilities, increasing its efficiencies and adding exceptional value for customers. Corinth Pipeworks S.A. has identified six areas of focus: Corporate Governance, its people, health and safety at workplace, market responsibility, care for the environment, support for the local community.
